title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 202.1 - Special facilities certified by the commissioner for drug addicts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 202.1 - Special facilities certified by the commissioner for drug addicts

State Regulations

Sections 204 and 205 of the Mental Hygiene Law provide that
the commissioner shall establish and certify special facilities to be used
exclusively for the care and treatment of narcotic addicts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
202.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
